scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npx @11ty/eleventy && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && npm run pagefind
scripts.minify:js: shx mkdir -p _site/js && npx terser ./js/collect.mjs -o ./_site/js/collect.mjs && npx terser ./js/dark-mode-toggle.min.mjs -o ./_site/js/dark-mode-toggle.min.mjs && npx terser ./js/performance-metrics.mjs -o ./_site/js/performance-metrics.mjs && npx terser ./js/script.mjs -o ./_site/js/script.mjs && npx terser ./js/share-image.mjs -o ./_site/js/share-image.mjs && npx terser ./js/share.mjs -o ./_site/js/share.mjs
scripts.minify:css: shx mkdir -p _site/css && npx postcss ./css/dark.css > ./_site/css/dark.css && npx postcss ./css/light.css > ./_site/css/light.css && npx postcss ./css/main.css > ./_site/css/main.css && npx postcss ./css/prism-theme.css > ./_site/css/prism-theme.css
scripts.postinstall: shx cp ./node_modules/dark-mode-toggle/dist/dark-mode-toggle.min.mjs ./js/ && shx cp ./node_modules/input-switch-polyfill/input-switch-polyfill.js ./js/ && shx cp ./node_modules/input-switch-polyfill/input-switch-polyfill.css ./js/
scripts.screenshots: npm stop && npx start-server-and-test start http://localhost:8080 'node ./_11ty/createScreenshots.js' && npm stop
